caption_original: In anticipation of Safe Boating Awareness Week, here are some safety tips from Minister Garneau. http://ow.ly/vGcX300niHo
caption_cleaned: In anticipation of Safe Boating Awareness Week, here are some safety tips from Minister Garneau.

caption_original: There is a fifth transportation mode beyond that which is known to man. It is a transportation mode as vast as oceans and as timeless as infinity. It is the middle ground between air and rail, between oceans and roads, and it lies between the pit of man's intrigue and the summit of his knowledge. This is the dimension of imagination. It is an area which we call the Transportation Zone!
caption_cleaned: There is a fifth transportation mode beyond that which is known to man. It is a transportation mode as vast as oceans and as timeless as infinity. It is the middle ground between air and rail, between oceans and roads, and it lies between the pit of man's intrigue and the summit of his knowledge. This is the dimension of imagination. It is an area which we call the Transportation Zone!

caption_original:
Happy International Museum Day! Over the years, many Canadian museums have benefited from federal infrastructure funding. 

Just last week, we announced over $18M for the Musée d’art contemporain de Montréal. Heritage Minister, Mélanie Joly, was at the event on behalf of Infrastructure and Communities Minister, Amarjeet Sohi, to announce support for the project to expand current exhibitions spaces and improve educational services.
caption_cleaned: Happy International Museum Day! Over the years, many Canadian museums have benefited from federal infrastructure funding. Just last week, we announced over $18M for the Musée d’art contemporain de Montréal. Heritage Minister, Mélanie Joly, was at the event on behalf of Infrastructure and Communities Minister, Amarjeet Sohi, to announce support for the project to eand current exhibitions spaces and improve educational services.

caption_original:
Highway 15 crosses the Island of Montréal from north to south. 

This major road is part of a network that serves the vast majority of the Montréal suburban area. It carries over 112,000 vehicles a day and maintenance of the surface of this part of the highway had become essential to traffic and user safety.

Thanks to federal financial support 7.7 kilometres of the highway between Mirabel and Blainville was repaired. 

Motorists now travel a safer, more fluid highway that preserves an essential link in the economic development of the region.
caption_cleaned: Highway crosses the Island of Montréal from north to south. This major road is part of a network that serves the vast majority of the Montréal suburban area. It carries over ,000 vehicles a day and maintenance of the surface of this part of the highway had become essential to traffic and user safety. Thanks to federal financial support kilometres of the highway between Mirabel and Blainville was repaired. Motorists now travel a safer, more fluid highway that preserves an essential link in the economic development of the region.
